author: Choo Han Teck J:
casenumber: High Court — Suit No 1060 of 2015 (Registrar’s Appeal Nos 345, 346 of 2019, and 10 of 2020, Summons 413 of 2020)
casename: First Global Funds Ltd PCC and others v PT Bank JTrust Indonesia, TBK and others
